mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY POSTKEY) SORTING, POSTKEY, POSTCATEGORY, USERID, POSTTITLE, POSTCONTENT, TO_CHAR(POSTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') POSTDATE, POSTVIEWCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF FROM POST WHERE POSTCATEGORY = #{postCategory} ORDER BY SORTING DESC

SELECT P.POSTKEY, M.MENU_CTGR, M.POSTCATEGORY, P.USERID, P.POSTTITLE, P.POSTCONTENT, TO_CHAR(P.POSTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') POSTDATE, P.POSTVIEWCOUNT, P.BNUM, P.LVL, P.STEP, P.NREF FROM POST P, BOARDMENUS M WHERE P.POSTCATEGORY = M.POSTCATEGORY AND P.POSTKEY = #{postKey} ORDER BY P.POSTKEY DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST(POSTKEY, POSTCATEGORY, USERID, POSTTITLE, POSTCONTENT, POSTDATE, POSTVIEWCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF) VALUES( POST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{postCategory}, #{userId}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, SYSDATE, 0, POST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 0, 0, POST_SEQ.NEXTVAL )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM POST WHERE POSTKEY = #{ postKey }
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(POSTKEY) AS totalCount FROM POST WHERE POSTCATEGORY = #{postCategory} AND POSTKEY > 0

SELECT COMMIDX,POSTKEY,POSTCATEGORY,USERID,COMMCONT,COMMDATE FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE POSTKEY = #{postKey} AND COMMIDX = #{commIdx} ORDER BY COMMIDX DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD_COMMENT WHERE POSTKEY = #{postKey} AND COMMIDX = #{commIdx}
